Product Title: PrettyDiva 1g Holographic Powder Rainbow Unicorn Chrome Nails Powder Manicure Pigment Top Grade

Store: Pretty Diva
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.01 x 1.61 x 0.39 inches; 0.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '701630344631', 'Manufacturer': 'Pretty Diva'}
Review Text: This holographic powder is amazing! Whoever says it doesn't work is probably not doing it right. If you rub it with an eyeshadow applicator over a NO WIPE top coat, it works and looks amazing!

reference_summary:
30000rpm Professional Electric Nail Drill Machine Pedicure Manicure Kits Nail File Drill with Sanding Bands, Nail Salon Art Tools SUBAY {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6.1 x 5.3 x 3.7 inches; 3.2 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'SUB3Z', 'UPC': '602668590901'} This nail drill is awesome! I got it right on time, started using it right away, have used it like 6 times since, it works great. To me it's an upgrade after what I got at Sally's. Love love love it! This nail drill is awesome! I got it right on time SNS Dipping Powder Vitamin Oil .5oz SNS {'Package Dimensions': '4.72 x 1.89 x 1.54 inches; 2.36 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Bergotti'} This cuticle oil is amazing! It's got a very gentle, light nice scent to it. I love it! Awesome 100 'Edge' Style of Well-less French Acrylic Artificial False Salon Nail Tips White ALLTOP {'Color': 'White', 'Size': 'Large', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'ALLTOP', 'Style': 'French', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No'} I haven't tried them yet because I'm not sure I'd be able to put acrylic over edge correctly but they do look like what I wanted. Thank you as Look great Misaki - Kolinsky Acrylic Nail Brush Powder For Manicure and Pedicure - Size #10 (Crimped) MISAKI {'Brand': 'MISAKI', 'Handle Material': 'Acrylic', 'Head Material': 'Kolinsky', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8 x 0.5 x 0.5 inches; 0.32 Ounces'} My brush did not come in a box like some pictures show, just in a plastic container. I used it today for the first time. Now, let me tell you, it takes me a while to know if I like a brush or not. To get used to it. I have some very good brushes but this one just beat them all! I love it! It is my definitely favorite brush! It's very high quality, holds its shape perfectly, acrylic doesn't get stuck in it.. It is by far the best brush I've ever used. I will recommend it to all my nail tech friends and will get a bunch of them as soon as I can just to make sure I'm good on brushes. And in case they quit selling them.

By the way, the fact that it's short is a plus in my book. That way I'm not worried that I'm gonna get it in my customer's eye when I'm brushing the acrylic back to the cuticle area. And it fits perfectly in my hand. Perfect. PrettyDiva 1g Holographic Powder Rainbow Unicorn Chrome Nails Powder Manicure Pigment Top Grade Pretty Diva {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.01 x 1.61 x 0.39 inches; 0.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '701630344631', 'Manufacturer': 'Pretty Diva'} This holographic powder is amazing! Whoever says it doesn't work is probably not doing it right. If you rub it with an eyeshadow applicator over a NO WIPE top coat, it works and looks amazing! Best powder ever!
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests:** Nail care, high-quality beauty tools, acrylic nail applications, cuticle oils, and effective nail techniques.
- **Purchase Frequency:** Active user who consistently invests in premium beauty products and tools to enhance nail care and artistry.
- **Preference for Quality and Performance:** Highly values products that offer significant performance improvements and aesthetic appeal, particularly enjoying reliable, well-designed solutions for professional-grade applications. Their latest purchase reflects an enthusiasm for innovative products that elevate their nail care routine.
- **Satisfaction with Timeliness:** Appreciates prompt delivery of products, which enhances their overall shopping experience and satisfaction.
- **Review Tendencies:** Tends to leave enthusiastic, positive feedback when products meet or exceed expectations. Recently expressed excitement about a new product that significantly outperforms previous tools, demonstrating a discerning approach to nail care. Their reviews highlight their commitment to quality and proper application techniques for optimal results.
- **Passion for Exploration:** Actively explores top-tier nail tools, reflecting a strong dedication to discovering effective and visually appealing solutions in nail artistry. Their continuous pursuit of excellence in nail products showcases their avid interest in staying ahead in beauty trends and techniques.
